alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:58PM CDT until August 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... East central Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Fargo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Briarwood around 700 PM CDT. Fargo and North River around 705 PM CDT. Dilworth, Moorhead and Oakport around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Glyndon and Averill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 59 and 70. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 344 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
